Blog

Nhu nhung ong bo ba me tre khac, nuoi con la mot trai nghiem moi me. Blog ghi lai nhung suy nghi va kinh nghiem thuc te cua Papapu.

More ›

Tai sao Bababu?

Bababu la tong hop kien thuc tu mot cap vo chong tre nguoi viet song va lam viec o nuoc ngoai. Nhu nhung ong bo ba me tre, vo chong Papapu phai tim hieu tu sach vo va kinh nghiem cua nguoi than de co gang cham soc Bababu. Hy vong, nhung ghi chep nay se giup ich cho cac gia dinh tuong lai.

More ›

Tim thong tin tren Babibu

Thong tin duoc chia ra cac muc o tren dau trang. Cac ban click vao cac muc cu the de doc. De quay lai trang chu, chon Start. Neu co gop y xin lien lac qua @phlow.

More ›

An uong

Thuc an dam cho tre

Thuc an cho tre tu 9-12 thang. But you can customize posts/pages easily via switches in the front matter to get a sidebar and/or to turn off meta-information at the end of the page like categories, tags and dates. Read More ›
